title: The Power of TIG Stack: Mastering Time Series Data Management
author: Anais Dotis-Georgiou
description: Time series data’s sequential nature, high write volumes and need for time-based querying demand purpose-built solutions. The TIG stack delivers.
cntitle: TIG Stack 的力量：掌握时间序列数据管理
cndescription: 时序数据的顺序性质、高写入量以及对基于时间的查询的需求，都需要专门构建的解决方案。TIG Stack 就能满足这些需求。
